SEARCH
Package service.impl

Class StaffServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
service.impl.StaffServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
StaffService
@Service public class StaffServiceImpl extends Object implements StaffService
Implementation of StaffService. Handles business logic for Career Center Staff administrative operations.
Since:
2025-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
SC2002 SCED Group-6
